name: CatchStars
description:
Catch the Stars !
This game was made for the Game Jam  "Paint Jam 2019"
Topic: "The Starry Night!"

Controls:
Blue man: wasd
Orange man: arrows

LEFT mouse: Blue Color
RIGHT mouse: Orange Color

Used software:
Graphics: MS Paint + PhotoShop
Music: beepbox
Sounds: bfxr
Game Engine: Unity
